messages.title: Wyre Forest First
messages.content: I will ensure Wyre Forest has a strong voice at Westminster. I will fight hard for jobs in Wyre Forest and for business. I will insist living standards of our families and the elderly are protected. I will fight hard to ensure young people have the best education and training for employment. I will always put your interests first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pledges to fight for Kidderminster Hospital and the NHS, and to get investment for health
Promises high standards of public services, jobs in Wyre Forest, pension needs of families protected and the Green Belt environment intact
Commits to ensuring the best education and training for employment
Wants to secure the budget for police, fire and ambulance services and the armed forces

issues.education: Ensuring young people have the best education and training
issues.health: Fight for Kidderminster Hospital and the NHS, get investment for health services
issues.socialWelfare: Insisting living standards of families and the elderly are protected

leaflet.personalStatement: I have always fought hard for the interests of Wyre Forest and our local community.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Worcestershire County Council and Wyre Forest District Council
politicalExperience.achievements: As Member of Worcestershire County Council and Wyre Forest District Council, defended Kidderminster Hospital, the Green Belt and the interests of the elderly.

endorsements.endorser: Dr Tony Zalin, retired Consultant Physician

images.caption: Image of two men shaking hands with text endorsing Nigel Knowles for Wyre Forest.
